You hear a rumor of a treasure outside the town.

You find a cave entrance covered in moss.

The path starts to thin and the trees feel like they are starting to reach towards you.

You hear a strange noise, unlike any animal you've heard before.

Rusty metal scraps are strewn about on the path ahead.
You stumble across the very fresh remains of another unfortunate adventurer.
A small trail winds deeper into the forest.
A strange glow emanates from a nearby cave.
You hear whispers of an ancient artifact hidden in the forest.
You find an abandoned campsite with a smoldering fire.
A massive tree has fallen, blocking the path ahead.
The town's tavern is bustling with adventurers sharing tales.
A steep path leads up to a snow-covered peak.
You overhear talk of a hidden cache of weapons in the hills.
A ray of moonlight reveals an old rune inscribed in the ground.
The ground trembles slightly as you approach an ancient ruin.
There are rumors of a powerful sorcerer's demise near the river.
A hidden path snakes into a dense thicket.
An eerie silence falls as you approach a shadowy grove.
A deserted ritual circle lies within a ring of standing stones.
The path widens into a grassy knoll, with wildflowers in bloom.
You spot a mysterious, weathered tome lying against a rock.
The trail descends into a dark, fog-covered valley.
The wind picks up suddenly, scattering leaves around you.
There is a rumor of a dragon hoard buried beneath the hills.
You discover a secluded waterfall with a hidden cave behind it.
A dilapidated rope bridge sways over a chasm.
You find an ancient door covered in runes, half-buried in moss.
